titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie being sundry wayes enfourmed, that many marchauntes, aswell of her owne subiects as straungers, seeking their owne singuler gaine and aduantage ...
Proclamations. 1564-01-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood Printers to the Quenes Maiesty [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against the engrossing of hops.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
